英文公告.附加說明: Tender Participation Qualification 1. Proof of Company registration or establishment of the supplier, such as certificate of company registration or commercial registration, certificate of establishment or business registration, factory registration certificate, industry registration certificate, practicing license.2. Proof of tax payment of the supplier, which shall be a business tax payment receipt or the latest sales revenue and tax report approved and affixed with an official seal by the responsible tax-assessing authority. If the supplier is unable to provide the most recent certifying documents in time, the tax payment receipt of the immediate preceding period may be used in replacement. Newly established suppliers who have not reached the time limit for filing their first tax payment may use, as a replacement, the approval letter of business establishment issued by the responsible business tax-assessing authority and the relevant documents in relation to their application for the purchase of uniformed invoices.Others1.Bidder statement for government procurement is requirement for making a tender.
